title: Sword of Cerebov
data:
{{version030}} {{flavour|A twisted blade, covered in eerie flames. Its demonic power burns away some of the fire resistance of those it strikes.}} [[File:Sword_of_cerebov.png]] '''''the +6 sword of Cerebov''''' +6 flamberge (modified [[great sword]]: 18 damage, -2 accuracy) [[Flaming]] brand
Inflicts rF- on hit
[[Evil]] ==Desirability== The '''sword of Cerebov'''{{source ref|0.30.1|art-data.txt|334}} is an [[unrand]] sword wielded by [[Cerebov]], a [[unique]] [[pandemonium lord]]. Foes struck by the sword lose 1 rank of [[fire resistance]], which can even make fire-immune foes vulnerable. On its own, this sword can be a strong weapon. But by the time you kill Cerebov, there's usually better options available. Even [[Long Blades]] users may prefer a +9 [[triple sword]] or one-handed sword. [[Fire Magic]] specialists will often want to blast enemies with big AOE ([[Ignition]], [[Fire Storm]]), leaving no time to swing in melee. Therefore, it is generally carried as a prize more than anything. ==History== *From [[0.19]] to [[0.28]], the sword of Cerebov had 16 base damage and [[riposte]]. *Prior to [[0.13]], the sword of Cerebov was a regular [[great sword]], and its special effect only ignored fire resistance for the sword's own damage. ==References== [[Category:Unrands]] [[Category:Long blades]]
